TopicTitle: Emperorconstantinus Streaming Kerbal Space Program+Other Games

Articles.Content:
I will be streaming from Monday-Sunday Between 10am-12pm At GMT 2+ Timezone

Plan is to stream atleast hour per day or 3 times a week.

Mostly Kerbal Space Program And Mount & Blade Warband Also sort of series in Finnish where i play Planetside 2 with my friends

Here is my Twitch channel to watch me streaming

http://www.twitch.tv/emperorconstantinus

Im going to post to this stream when i either start to stream or when i will be streaming
